items.sentence: Tom stood alone on his balcony overlooking the ocean.
Tom stood in front of the class and recited the poem.
There\'s no way I\'m leaving you here alone with Tom.
You look tired. You ought to rest for an hour or two.
Why don\'t you just take it back to where you got it?
Why don\'t you tell me everything you know about Tom?
I think you should tell Tom that you don\'t like him.
I think you\'re the person who caused this to happen.
I couldn\'t find work in Boston, so I came back home.
I couldn\'t think of anything that needed to be done.
